note: Poverty data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Depending on the country and year, the data relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Cereal yield vs. extreme poverty rate
subtitle: Extreme poverty is defined as living below the [International Poverty Line](#dod:international-poverty-line) of $3 per day. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
